problem.p: What would be the values of the variables “result1” and “result2” after executing the following segment of code?

div.p: After executing the first two lines of the code segment, a will have a value of 6 and b a value of 42.

When executing the third line of the code segment, the incremented value of a is used when evaluating the expression int result1 = b / ++a;. The value of a is incremented to 7 before the expression is evaluated. Therefore, result1 = 42 / 7 = 6.

When executing the fourth line of the code segment, the current value of a is used when evaluating the expression int result2 = b / a++;. The value of a is incremented after the expression is evaluated. Therefore, result2 = 42 / 7 = 6. The final value of a is 8.
